title: Lowest Investment in Research and Development
description: In 2018, Mauritania allocated only 0.01% of its GDP to research and development, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Minimal Insurance and Financial Services Imports
description: In 2023, insurance and financial services accounted for just 0.037% of Mauritania's service imports, indicating a low reliance on these sectors.

title: Extended Lead Time for Imports
description: In 2016, the median lead time to import goods into Mauritania was 32 days, highlighting significant logistical challenges.

title: Low Share of Insurance in Commercial Service Imports
description: Insurance and financial services made up only 0.039% of Mauritania's commercial service imports in 2023, reflecting a limited market presence.
